snippet: British actress Sienna Miller spoke on Friday of her anger that "titillating" information about her affair with James Bond actor Daniel Craig had been made public at the phone-hacking trial of a former Rupert Murdoch tabloid editor....

headline.print_headline: Actress Sienna Miller Angry at British Phone-Hacking Case Details
headline.main: Actress Sienna Miller Angry at British Phone-Hacking Case Details

lead_paragraph: British actress Sienna Miller spoke on Friday of her anger that "titillating" information about her affair with James Bond actor Daniel Craig had been made public at the phone-hacking trial of a former Rupert Murdoch tabloid editor.
